Episodes.Title: Enemies of Rome
Episodes.Plot: The rebellion Spartacus has created has turned into thousands and now with Crixus and Gannicus they begin to take on Rome. Unknowingly to them, the powers of the Empire are forced to turn to wealthy, ambitious Marcus Crassus to aid the campaign, along with a young Julius Caesar.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Wolves at the Gate
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus leads a daring assault to provide food and shelter for his people. Crassus builds a fearsome army and receives an unexpected visitor.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Men of Honor
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus considers striking a deal with a band of marauders to ensure his people stay supplied and fed. Crassus son Tiberius makes a bold and fateful decision.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Decimation
Episodes.Plot: The possible infiltration of a Roman spy causes tension to mount between Spartacus and his men. Crassus resurrects a long abandoned form of Roman punishment to teach his soldiers a brutal lesson.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Blood Brothers
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus puts a plan in motion to weaken Crassus forces and gain the upper hand. Betrayal threatens to foil the plan.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Spoils of War
Episodes.Plot: As Crassus leads an onslaught against the rebel-occupied city, Gannicus finds himself trapped behind enemy lines. Tiberius is tasked by Crassus to hold a celebration in honor of a man he despises.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Mors Indecepta
Episodes.Plot: Their forces trapped on an impassable, snowbound ridge, Spartacus and Crixus clash over the method of escape. Crassus discovers it increasingly difficult to control the actions of those closest to him.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Separate Paths
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus and the rebels arrive at a crossroads. With the relentless Crassus driving his men hard in the pursuit of Spartacus, the conflict between Tiberius and Caesar escalates.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: The Dead and the Dying
Episodes.Plot: Crassus learns that a fellow prominent Roman is attempting to steal the glory of defeating Spartacus; Spartacus aims to secure a bargaining chip he can use against the Romans.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Victory
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus and his outnumbered rebels make one last attempt to win freedom in a final battle against the Romans led by Marcus Crassus.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence and sex scenes
